sense.name: money spent, expenditures
sense.commentary: OUTLAY[+quantity][+sum][+money][+expenditure] Note: refers to an amount of money, a quantity, not an act of spending (Sense 2)
sense.examples: The outlays for national defense increased 10 percent last year. John keeps track of each outlay for his new business.

sense.name: the act of spending, disbursing funds
sense.commentary: OUTLAY[+action][+spending][+money] Note: refers to someone's activity of spending, rather than a quantity (Sense 1)
sense.examples: Bob couldn't continue the outlay of maintaining a summer home. At some point the outlay for this research project will exhaust our funds.
